QuestData.Title: The Grand Magus Doane
QuestData.Description: <The Bravo Company field kit vibrates.>$B$BGood work, kid. I've got some vital intel for you. The magus in the tower is a human named Doane. Damned traitor is working for the Blackrock orcs. I want him dead.$B$BUse the key of Ilgalar and get inside that tower. Work your way to the top and show Doane what Bravo Company does with traitors.$B$BRendezvous back at Shalewind Canyon when the deed is done.$B$BKeeshan, over and out.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Time to make a magus cry like the little girl that he is. Don't tell Messner I said that.
QuestData.RewardText: He teleported away? Mentioned Darkblaze? What the hell is going on here.$B$BLooks like it's time to strap in and finish this nonsense.
